attributes.action: give CCF units their LSWs back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Virtually all Combined Cadet Force contingent have lost their L86 Light Support Weapons a few years ago, supposedly to support the situation in Iraq.  Now the Iraq situation is calming down the Cadet units should get their LSWs back in order to better support their exercises and in turn better prepare those many cadets who go into the forces; especially because the LSW is largely being replaced in service by the Minimi Light Machine Gun.
